summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6219 for the improvement of East 62nd Street from 40th Ave. Northeast to 43rd Ave. Northeast; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88699, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
